trans-unit.source: Interactively controls a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Kontrollerer interaktivt en <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Use a ClockController to interactively begin, pause, resume, seek, skip, stop, and remove a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock>.
trans-unit.target: Bruk en ClockController interaktivt starte, stanse midlertidig, gjenoppta, søker etter, Hopp over, stoppe og fjerne <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock>

trans-unit.source: You can only interactively control root-level clocks.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bare interaktivt kontrollere primære klokker.

trans-unit.source: Sets the target <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Clock*> to begin at the next tick.
trans-unit.target: Angir målet <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Clock*>å starte på neste aksemerkene.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Clock*>

trans-unit.source: This method causes the target <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock> to behave as though its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline> object's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime%2A> were set to the time of the next tick.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden vil målet <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock>fungerer som selv om den <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline>objektets <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime%2A>ble satt til tidspunktet for neste aksemerkene.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock>

trans-unit.source: The timeline's actual <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime%2A> setting is ignored (but not changed).
trans-unit.target: Tidslinjen er faktiske <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime%2A>innstillingen ignoreres (men ikke endret).</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method changes the target clock's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentState%2A> to <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockState>.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden endres target-klokken <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentState%2A> <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockState>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockState> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentState%2A>

trans-unit.source: The Begin method does not resume a paused clock.
trans-unit.target: Begin-metode gjenoppta ikke en midlertidig stanset klokken.

trans-unit.source: This method has no effect on the timing tree until the next time a tick is processed.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden har ingen innvirkning på treet timing før neste gang en aksemerkene behandles.

trans-unit.source: As a side-effect, the appropriate events will also not be raised until then.
trans-unit.target: Som en side effekt vil de aktuelle hendelsene også ikke oppstå inntil videre.

trans-unit.source: Calling this method triggers the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentStateInvalidated> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidated> events.
trans-unit.target: Kaller denne metoden utløser i <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentStateInvalidated>og <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidated>hendelser.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidated> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentStateInvalidated>

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock"></xref> controlled by this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter den <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock"> </xref> kontrolleres av dette <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock"></xref> controlled by this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock"> </xref> kontrolleres av dette <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Stops the target <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock"></xref> from progressing.
trans-unit.target: Stopper målet <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock"> </xref> fra med fremdrift.

trans-unit.source: You can pause a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock> regardless of its current state, and pausing a clock does not change its current state.
trans-unit.target: Du kan stoppe en <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock>uavhengig av gjeldende tilstand, og stanses midlertidig en klokken, endres ikke den gjeldende tilstanden.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock>

trans-unit.source: A clock can be paused while <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockState>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockState>, or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockState>.
trans-unit.target: En klokken kan stanses midlertidig under <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockState>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockState>, eller <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockState>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockState> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockState> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockState>

trans-unit.source: The only way to unpause a clock is by using the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Resume%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Den eneste måten å aktivere en klokken er ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Resume%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Resume%2A>

trans-unit.source: Pausing a clock implicitly pauses its children.
trans-unit.target: Midlertidig Stans en klokken implisitt underordnede elementer.

trans-unit.source: Calling this method when the target clock is already paused has no effect.
trans-unit.target: Kaller denne metoden når klokken mål er allerede satt på pause har ingen virkning.

trans-unit.source: Pausing a clock triggers the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidated> event.
trans-unit.target: Stans klokken-utløsere i <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidated>hendelsen.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidated>

trans-unit.source: Removes the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock"></xref> associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController"></xref> from the properties it animates.
trans-unit.target: Fjerner det <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock"> </xref> knyttet til dette <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController"> </xref> fra egenskapene for den animerer.

trans-unit.source: The clock and its child clocks will no longer affect these properties.
trans-unit.target: Klokken og de underordnede klokkene påvirker ikke lenger disse egenskapene.

trans-unit.source: This method triggers the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.RemoveRequested> event.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden utløser i <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.RemoveRequested>hendelsen.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.RemoveRequested>

trans-unit.source: Enables a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock"></xref> that was previously paused to resume progressing.
trans-unit.target: Aktiverer en <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock"> </xref> som tidligere ble midlertidig for å gjenoppta med fremdrift.

trans-unit.source: You can pause or resume a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock> regardless of its current state, and pausing or resuming a clock does not change its current state.
trans-unit.target: Du kan stopper eller gjenopptar en <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock>uavhengig av den gjeldende tilstand, og Stans eller gjenopptar en klokken, endres ikke den gjeldende tilstanden.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock>

trans-unit.source: A clock can be paused while <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockState>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockState>, or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockState>.
trans-unit.target: En klokken kan stanses midlertidig under <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockState>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockState>, eller <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockState>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockState> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockState> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockState>

trans-unit.source: The only way to resume a paused clock is by using the Resume method.
trans-unit.target: Det er den eneste måten å gjenoppta en midlertidig stanset klokken ved hjelp av Resume-metoden.

trans-unit.source: Resuming a clock implicitly resumes its children.
trans-unit.target: Gjenopptar en klokken implisitt gjenopptar underordnede elementer.

trans-unit.source: Calling this method on a clock that is not paused has no effect.
trans-unit.target: Kall til denne metoden i en klokken ikke er stanset midlertidig har ingen virkning.

trans-unit.source: Resuming a paused clock triggers the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidated> event.
trans-unit.target: Gjenopptar en midlertidig stanset klokken utløsere i <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidated>hendelsen.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidated>

trans-unit.source: Seeks the target <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Clock*> by the specified amount when the next tick occurs.
trans-unit.target: Søker etter målet <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Clock*>for datamengden angitt når neste aksemerkene oppstår.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Clock*>

trans-unit.source: If the target clock is stopped, seeking makes it active again.
trans-unit.target: Hvis klokken mål er stoppet, aktiverer søking den på nytt.

trans-unit.source: Seek operations do not take the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.SpeedRatio%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline.SlipBehavior%2A> settings of this clock's timeline into account: the clock is treated as though its timeline has a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.SpeedRatio%2A> of 1 and no <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline.SlipBehavior%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Søk etter operasjoner trer ikke den <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.SpeedRatio%2A>eller <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline.SlipBehavior%2A>innstillingene for denne klokken tidslinjen hensyn: klokken behandles som om tidslinjen har en <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.SpeedRatio%2A>1 og ingen <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline.SlipBehavior%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline.SlipBehavior%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.SpeedRatio%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline.SlipBehavior%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.SpeedRatio%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method changes the clock's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentState%2A> to <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockState>.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden endres av klokken <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentState%2A> <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockState>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockState> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentState%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method has no effect on the timing tree until the next time a tick is processed.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden har ingen innvirkning på treet timing før neste gang en aksemerkene behandles.

trans-unit.source: As a side-effect, the appropriate events also will not be raised until then.
trans-unit.target: Som en side effekt vil de aktuelle hendelsene også ikke oppstå inntil videre.

trans-unit.source: Seeking a storyboard triggers the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidated> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentStateInvalidated> events.
trans-unit.target: Søking dreieboken-utløsere i <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidated>og <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentStateInvalidated>hendelser.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentStateInvalidated> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidated>

trans-unit.source: If the target clock has children, their current time is updated accordingly.
trans-unit.target: Hvis target klokken har underordnede, oppdateres til gjeldende klokkeslett i henhold til dette.

trans-unit.source: The seek offset, measured in the target clock's time.
trans-unit.target: Forskyvningen for søk, målt i målet klokkeslettet.

trans-unit.source: This offset is relative to the clock's <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimeSeekOrigin"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimeSeekOrigin"></xref>, depending on the value of `origin`.
trans-unit.target: Denne forskyvningen er i forhold til klokken <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimeSeekOrigin"> </xref> eller <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimeSeekOrigin"> </xref>, avhengig av verdien for `origin`.

trans-unit.source: A value that indicates whether the specified offset is relative to the target clock's <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimeSeekOrigin"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimeSeekOrigin"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En verdi som angir om den angitte forskyvningen er i forhold til mål-klokken <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimeSeekOrigin"> </xref> eller <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimeSeekOrigin"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Seeks the target <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock"></xref> by the specified amount immediately.
trans-unit.target: Søker etter målet <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock"> </xref> av angitte hvor umiddelbart.

trans-unit.source: If the target clock is stopped, seeking makes it active again.
trans-unit.target: Hvis klokken mål er stoppet, aktiverer søking den på nytt.

trans-unit.source: Seek operations do not take the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.SpeedRatio%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline.SlipBehavior%2A> settings of this clock's timeline into account: the clock is treated as though its timeline has a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.SpeedRatio%2A> of 1 and no <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline.SlipBehavior%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Søk etter operasjoner trer ikke den <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.SpeedRatio%2A>eller <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline.SlipBehavior%2A>innstillingene for denne klokken tidslinjen hensyn: klokken behandles som om tidslinjen har en <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.SpeedRatio%2A>1 og ingen <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline.SlipBehavior%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline.SlipBehavior%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.SpeedRatio%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline.SlipBehavior%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.SpeedRatio%2A>

trans-unit.source: SeekAlignedToLastTick aligns the seeked time of the clock with the last clock tick.
trans-unit.target: SeekAlignedToLastTick justerer seeked klokkeslettet klokken med siste klokken aksemerkene.

trans-unit.source: Values are immediately updated to reflect the changes due to SeekAlignedToLastTick, even though the screen will not reflect these changes until the screen updates.
trans-unit.target: Verdiene blir umiddelbart oppdatert for å gjenspeile endringer på grunn av SeekAlignedToLastTick, selv om skjermen ikke reflektere disse endringene før skjermen oppdateringene.

trans-unit.source: If the target clock has children, their current time is updated accordingly.
trans-unit.target: Hvis target klokken har underordnede, oppdateres til gjeldende klokkeslett i henhold til dette.

trans-unit.source: This method changes the clock's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentState%2A> to <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockState>.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden endres av klokken <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentState%2A> <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockState>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockState> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentState%2A>

trans-unit.source: Seeking a storyboard triggers the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidated> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentStateInvalidated> events.
trans-unit.target: Søking dreieboken-utløsere i <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidated>og <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentStateInvalidated>hendelser.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentStateInvalidated> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidated>

trans-unit.source: The seek offset, measured in the target clock's time.
trans-unit.target: Forskyvningen for søk, målt i målet klokkeslettet.

trans-unit.source: This offset is relative to the clock's <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimeSeekOrigin"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimeSeekOrigin"></xref>, depending on the value of `origin`.
trans-unit.target: Denne forskyvningen er i forhold til klokken <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimeSeekOrigin"> </xref> eller <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimeSeekOrigin"> </xref>, avhengig av verdien for `origin`.

trans-unit.source: A value that indicates whether the specified offset is relative to the target clock's <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimeSeekOrigin"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimeSeekOrigin"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En verdi som angir om den angitte forskyvningen er i forhold til mål-klokken <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimeSeekOrigin"> </xref> eller <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimeSeekOrigin"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Advances the current time of the target <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock"></xref> to the end of its active period.
trans-unit.target: Flytter gjeldende klokkeslett for <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock"> </xref> til slutten av den aktive perioden.

trans-unit.source: This method advances the target clock's current time to the end of its active period; the clock's behavior at this point is specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.FillBehavior%2A> setting of its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline>.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden flytter target-klokken gjeldende klokkeslett til slutten av den aktive perioden. innstillingene for klokken virkemåte er for øyeblikket angitt av <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.FillBehavior%2A>innstillingen for den <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.FillBehavior%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the timeline's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.FillBehavior%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.FillBehavior>, the clock fills; if the property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.FillBehavior>, the clock stops.
trans-unit.target: Hvis tidslinjen <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.FillBehavior%2A>er satt til <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.FillBehavior>, klokken fyller; Hvis egenskapen er satt til <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.FillBehavior>, klokken stopper.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.FillBehavior> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.FillBehavior> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.FillBehavior%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method has an effect only if the target clock's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentState%2A> is <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockState>.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden har en effekt hvis target-klokken <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentState%2A>er <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockState>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockState> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentState%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method has no effect on the timing tree until the next time a tick is processed.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden har ingen innvirkning på treet timing før neste gang en aksemerkene behandles.

trans-unit.source: As a side-effect, the appropriate events also will not be raised until then.
trans-unit.target: Som en side effekt vil de aktuelle hendelsene også ikke oppstå inntil videre.

trans-unit.source: Advancing a storyboard to its fill period triggers the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidated> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentStateInvalidated> events.
trans-unit.target: Å flytte en dreiebok til fyllet period utløsere i <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidated>og <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentStateInvalidated>hendelser.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentStateInvalidated> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidated>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the interactive speed of the target <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir interaktive hastigheten for <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Setting this property has no effect until the next tick.
trans-unit.target: Angi denne egenskapen har ingen virkning før neste aksemerkene.

trans-unit.source: If you set this property and then get its value before the next tick occurs, you'll get the old value.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du angir denne egenskapen, og få verdien før skjer neste aksemerkene, får du gammel verdi.

trans-unit.source: This property will return the new value after the next tick.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen, tilbakestiller den nye verdien etter neste aksemerkene.

trans-unit.source: Setting this property does not change the value of the underlying timeline's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.SpeedRatio%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Angi denne egenskapen endre ikke verdien for den underliggende tidslinjens <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.SpeedRatio%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.SpeedRatio%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting this property triggers the target clock's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidated> event.
trans-unit.target: Angi denne egenskapen utløser target-klokken <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidated>hendelsen.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidated>

trans-unit.source: A finite value greater than zero that describes the interactive speed of the target clock.
trans-unit.target: En fast verdi større enn null, og som beskriver interaktive hastigheten på klokken mål.

trans-unit.source: This value is multiplied against the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.SpeedRatio*> of the clock's <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline"></xref>. For example, if the timeline's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.SpeedRatio*> is 0.5 and the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController"></xref> object's SpeedRatio is 3.0, the timeline moves at 1.5 times normal speed (0.5 * 3.0).
trans-unit.target: Denne verdien multipliseres mot verdien for den <> </> *> av innstillingene for klokken <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline"> </xref>. For eksempel hvis tidslinjen <> </> *> er 0,5 og <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController"> </xref> objektets SpeedRatio er 3.0, tidslinjen flytter ved 1,5 ganger normal hastighet (0,5 * 3.0).

trans-unit.source: The default value is 1.0.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er 1.0.

trans-unit.source: Stops the target <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Stopper målet <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This method changes the target clock's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentState%2A> to <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Stopped%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden endres target-klokken <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentState%2A> <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Stopped%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Stopped%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentState%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Stopped%2A> clock can be restarted by using the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Begin%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Seek%2A>, or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.SeekAlignedToLastTick%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Stopped%2A>klokken startes på nytt ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Begin%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Seek%2A>, eller <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.SeekAlignedToLastTick%2A>metode.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.SeekAlignedToLastTick%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Seek%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Begin%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Stopped%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method has no effect on the timing tree until the next time a tick is processed.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden har ingen innvirkning på treet timing før neste gang en aksemerkene behandles.

trans-unit.source: As a side-effect, the appropriate events also will not be raised until then.
trans-unit.target: Som en side effekt vil de aktuelle hendelsene også ikke oppstå inntil videre.

trans-unit.source: Stopping a clock triggers the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidated> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentStateInvalidated> events, but not the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Completed> event.
trans-unit.target: Stopper et klokken utløser i <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidated>og <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentStateInvalidated>hendelser, men ikke i <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Completed>hendelsen.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Completed> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentStateInvalidated> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidated>
